synopsis.text: Quon and his friends are "Attractors" - humans with awakened supernatural abilities. They find themselves hunted by a secret organization for reasons unknown. The story takes a dark turn when flower drawings are discovered near murder victims around the city. The flowers suggest the killer drugs victims prior to murdering them. A new Attractor appears with the power to communicate with plants. Their involvement in the serial murders is unclear. Quon struggles with the ethical dilemma of whether to save this dangerous Attractor from the organization hunting them or allow the killings to continue. After surviving a recent battle, the Attractors regroup and integrate new allies into their team. However, the serial murders with connections to flowers soon capture everyone's attention. Realizing another Attractor is likely responsible, the secret organization moves to eliminate them. Quon faces his deepest ideological conflict yet - save a serial killer Attractor or waver in his conviction to rescue all Attractors. The thrilling outcome will define him and his friends in their fight for survival.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
